  • Fantastic launch event for the Toronto Fringe’s new Fringe Club at Scadding Court Community Centre. Highlight was a Chinese song & dance performance by members of the Singing Social Club. So happy to see the Fringe forging strong ties with the community right from the start.

    May 31, 2017 at 11:47pm

  • A Few Quick Highlights from PACTcon

    Feeling rejuvenated and charged with purpose and possibility after attending (and staffing) the PACT conference last week. Cannot believe how many artistic people I met! So lucky. Feeling like I have a much better idea of the organization’s place (and my place) in the sector, and some new ideas about approaches I can take to my work.

    Read more → May 30, 2017

  • Got back from Charlottetown last night, and I’m already missing the cool island air - Toronto leaves a little to be desired. Lots of thoughts bouncing around my head today. Feeling inspired.
